input.sentences: last week i went on vacation to another country .
there were a lot of interesting people that i met while i was there .
i got to talk with a lot of the shop owners there .
some of them wanted me to sign papers .
i told them i did n't want to and then they called the police .
output.sentences: This week we are taking a vacation to another country.
I have met a lot of interesting people.
I really enjoyed talking to the shop owners.
I don't know why the waitress wants me to sign these papers.
She thought my card was stolen so she called the police and told them.
